sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均含有"缩短"之意。
means: shorten ： 通常指缩短时间、尺寸或过程。
abbreviate ： 指省去应有的或后续的部分，从而使整体缩短。也可指缩短时间。
abridge ： 多指对书籍的删节或缩短，删去不重要部分而保存其精华。
cut ： 普通用词，指任何缩短而缩减的过程。

sentence.Network_en: As they shorten, cells become more prone to disease and death.
sentence.Network_cn: 细胞变小后就会更容易感染疾病，也更容易死亡。

sentence.Network_en: Her father paid £1,000 for an operation to shorten her nose.
sentence.Network_cn: 她父亲花了1,000英镑给她做了削鼻手术。

sentence.Network_en: When the days shorten in winter some people suffer depression.
sentence.Network_cn: 冬季天短，有些人会变得抑郁消沉。

means.word_mean: 减少,节省,裁减,修剪,缝边

entry.def: If you shorten an event or the length of time that something lasts, or if it shortens, it does not last as long as it would otherwise do or as it used to do.

example.ex: The trading day is shortened in observance of the Labor Day holiday...
example.tran: 因庆祝劳工节，这个交易日交易时间缩短了。

entry.def: If you shorten an object or if it shortens, it becomes smaller in length.

example.ex: Her father paid £1,000 for an operation to shorten her nose...
example.tran: 她父亲花了 1,000 英镑给她做了削鼻手术。

example.ex: As they shorten, cells become more prone to disease and death.
example.tran: 细胞变小后就会更容易感染疾病，也更容易死亡。

entry.def: If you shorten a name or other word, you change it by removing some of the letters.

example.ex: Originally called Lili, she eventually shortened her name to Lee.
example.tran: 她原先叫 Lili (莉莉)，最后她把名字略作 Lee (李)。

means.word_mean: 1. make shorter than originally intended; reduce or retrench in length or duration;

sentences.sentence: "He shortened his trip due to illness"

means.word_mean: 2. reduce in scope while retaining essential elements;

sentences.sentence: "shorten the rope by a few inches"

means.word_mean: 5. edit by omitting or modifying parts considered indelicate;

auth_sentence.content: Driving a cab tends to shorten your life span.
auth_sentence.res_content: Driving a cab tends to shorten your life span.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Driving a cab tends to shorten your life span.

auth_sentence.content: Wouldn't 'shorten life' cover it in any case?
auth_sentence.res_content: Wouldn't 'shorten life' cover it in any case?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Wouldn't 'shorten life' cover it in any case?

auth_sentence.content: He hit upon the idea of endnotes to shorten it.
auth_sentence.res_content: He hit upon the idea of endnotes to shorten it.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He hit upon the idea of endnotes to shorten it.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表动词,"变成"; 2. 表形容词,"由……制成的",通常加在名词后面; 3. 表名词,"人或物"

stems_affixes.word_buile: strait海峡,困难+en变成→adj.艰难的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 金黄色的;贵重的,极好的
stems_affixes.word_buile: gold金+en由……制成的→adj.金黄色的;贵重的,极好的
oak橡树+en由……制成的→adj.橡木制的
wax蜡+en由……制成的→adj.蜡的,蜡制的
wood木头+en由……制成的→adj.木制的;呆笨的
wool羊毛+en由……制成的→adj. 羊毛[制]的;毛纺的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 未婚的,纯洁的,无经验的
stems_affixes.word_buile: maid少女+en人或物→n.少女,处女 adj.未婚的,纯洁的,无经验的
chick小鸡+en人或物→n.鸡肉;鸡,小鸡,小鸟
city城市+en人或物→citizen
heath荒野,树丛+en人或物→n.异教徒
kit=cat猫+en人或物→kitten
maid少女+en人或物→n.少女,处女 adj.未婚的,纯洁的,无经验的
vix雌狐+en人或物→n.雌狐,泼妇
ward守卫,看守+en人或物→n.看守人,管理员
bright明亮的+en变成→v.[使]变亮,[使]愉快
broad宽+en变成→v.放宽,变阔
damp潮湿+en变成→v.[使]潮湿,使沮丧,泼凉水
dark黑+en变成→v.[使]变黑[变暗]
fright惊骇,吃惊+en变成→v.使惊吓;惊恐
hast匆忙+en变成→v.催促 v.赶紧
length长,长度+en变成→v.延长,[使]变长
sharp尖+en变成→v.削尖,使敏锐
short短+en变成→v.弄短,缩小,减少
sweet甜+en变成→v.使变甜 v.变甜
threat恐吓,凶兆,威胁I+en变成→v.恐吓,威胁
tight紧的+en变成→v.变紧,绷紧,拉紧
wake叫醒+en变成→v.醒来 v.唤醒
weak弱的+en变成→v.削弱,[使]变弱

Sentence.sentence: The workers' pay was raised and their working hours were shortened.

sentences.en: She shortened the skirt by an inch.
sentences.cn: 她把裙子缩短了一英寸。

jushi.chinese: 这件上衣水洗后变短了。
